name: LocalFoody
tag_list: food, organic, local, sustainable, agriculture, directory
overview:
LocalFoody is a geographic and socially connected local and organic food directory.

LocalFoody enables people to locate food sources that will improve their health and the health of the planet. At the same time, Localfoody contributes to the growth of local, organic producers and market makers by making it easier for potential customers to find them.

We do this by detecting the userâ€™s location and automatically displaying locally relevant food sources. We then allow them to provide more information for a personalized experience and to share with their friends in social networks.
